name: FarmLife (sipsop)
description:
A small prototype of a farming game, i found a Jam about Farming, and i had just 6 days from the begining, also in this game everything was made from scratch.

I'm a lover of old farming games, starting with SNES Harvest Moon by Natsume and i decided i could make something like that. A lot of ideas are already made on paper, but had no time to make them work.

I really like to continue this project because it was great to make it and i know there are tons of features i can add.
I don't ´plan it to be the next Stardew Valley but it will be great if i can make a longer game and that's why save features should be improved ASAP.

I hope you enjoy them, if you have any ideas or notice a bug, please let me know, or if you only want to make a comment, it will be wellcome.

CONTROLS:
Use arrow keys to move or ASWD, X and E are action keys.
If you are using a mobile device, just click on the simulated controls. I could not have the chance to check the inventory, i'm sorry.

INSTRUCTIONS
Talk to the seeds to buy them and then plant them on the field.
Water them and see them raising.
